title: Kim Kardashitrends 10/3: Kim Kardashian, Lena Dunham, Sacheen Littlefeather, Jeffrey Dahmer, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Herschel Walker
itunes:title: Kim Kardashitrends 10/3: Kim Kardashian, Lena Dunham, Sacheen Littlefeather, Jeffrey Dahmer, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Herschel Walker
description:
In this edition of Kim Kardashitrends, Jack and Miles discuss the SEC fining Kim Kardashian $1.3m for shilling crypto currency, Lena Dunham demanding her casket be included in the NYC Pride Parade when she dies, Sacheen Littlefeather, the activist who rejected Marlon Brando’s Oscar, passes at the age of 75, Twitter uses and families of the the victims are urging others NOT to watch the Jeffrey Dahmer show on Netflix, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever dropped a new trailer that teases who is taking up the mantle of Black Panther and Herschel Walker, who is running for the Senate in Georgia, continues turning progressive policy ideas into wild claims that make no sense.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this edition of Kim Kardashitrends, Jack and Miles discuss the SEC fining Kim Kardashian $1.3m for shilling crypto currency, Lena Dunham demanding her casket be included in the NYC Pride Parade when she dies, Sacheen Littlefeather, the activist who rejected Marlon Brando’s Oscar, passes at the age of 75, Twitter uses and families of the the victims are urging others NOT to watch the Jeffrey Dahmer show on Netflix, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever dropped a new trailer that teases who is taking up the mantle of Black Panther and Herschel Walker, who is running for the Senate in Georgia, continues turning progressive policy ideas into wild claims that make no sense.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Daily Zeitgeist, Lena Dunham, Kim Kardashian, Crypto, Black Panther, Sacheen Littlefeather, Jeffrey Dahmer, Netflix, Herschel Walker
